r.d: This extension is a librdkafka binding providing a working client for Kafka
r.n: * Expose query watermark offsets (#219, @gytislakavicius) * Support sending timestamp (epoch ms) in producev (#228, @lkm) * Fix KafkaTopic::producev causing segfault on librdkafka 1.0.0 (#222, @Steveb-p) * Fix version parsing (#224, @dariuskasiulevicius)
